class jiraclient.jira.Auth(auth_type, authfile=None)[source]¶

Supports auth from environment variables as well as a auth.cfg file for auth.cfg, auth_type should be set to ‘file’. authfile should be the full path to the file. See included auth.cfg_example

exception jiraclient.jira.AuthenticationFailure[source]¶

Custom Exception class for Authentication failures

class jiraclient.jira.Case(case_json)[source]¶

Case object

exception jiraclient.jira.ConnectionFailure[source]¶

Custom Exception class for Connection failures

exception jiraclient.jira.JQLError[source]¶

Custom Exception class for failed JQL queiries

class jiraclient.jira.Jira(auth)[source]¶

Main Jira Object

add_comment(case_id, comment)[source]¶

Append a comment to a case

create_case(case_dict)[source]¶

Creates a case from a dict. Currently doesn’t do any validation against the ‘createmeta’ as each use case will be different

createmeta[source]¶

“create meta” is a dump of all possible field settings that can be set on case creation

get(ids)[source]¶

Get cases based on ids

search(jql, startat=0, maxresults=100, fields='')[source]¶

Runs a Jira query from supplied jql. Caps results by default at 100.

serverinfo[source]¶

Get jira server info

test_connection()[source]¶

Test connection to server, return status msg
